channel.title: Error Connecting to Server
channel.description:
I'm using two machines to test out the client + portforwarding. The portforwarding was done correctly:
solacescape.no-ip.org on port 43594 is currently Online
I can connect using the client from the machine where the server is running - I moved the client from that machine to this machine and tried to connect. I then get the error message "Error connecting to server." As if the client is offline. I have changed the IP in the client.java file, and there is no GUI files to edit. Any help is appreciated. ^^

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @Solace Solace
item.description:
@Solace wrote:

I’m using two machines to test out the client + portforwarding.

The portforwarding was done correctly:

solacescape.no-ip.org on port 43594 is currently Online

I can connect using the client from the machine where the server is running - I moved the client from that machine to this machine and tried to connect. I then get the error message “Error connecting to server.” As if the client is offline. I have changed the IP in the client.java file, and there is no GUI files to edit.

Any help is appreciated. ^^
